DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of Tarceva (erlotinib) in elderly patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) after failure of at least one prior chemotherapy regimen. Data of patients treated with Tarceva in routine clinical practice will be collected for 1 year.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Tarceva (Erlotinib) in Elderly Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, > 65 years of age Locally advanced or metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer (Stage IIIb or IV) Failure of at least one prior standard platinumbased chemotherapy Age < 65 years
